title: Fracked
description: John and his wife Rebecca lived a simple life in the smalltown of Tres Rios, Texas until the multinational energy conglomerate Triburtonmoved in. As the company took root and started driving away entire generations of families with their reckless drilling operations, circumstances forced the couple to work for the very company thatdestroyed their hometown. Together they dream about the day they can move awayand start a new life together.However, after an industrial hydraulic fracking accidentunleashes a plague deep from the depths of the Eagle Ford Shale, the couple isforced to put their dreams on hold as they embark on a desperate fight forsurvival.Not only do they have to survive the dangerous onslaught ofthe ravenous infected, but they also have to contend with the extreme measuresthat Triburton undertakes in the company's desperate attempt to cover up thehorrific truth from the world.
author: Mark D.  Campbell
